B:

$\begin{array}{l c r}{{y_{t}=\ell_{t-1}s_{t-m}+\varepsilon_{t}}}\\ {{\ell_{t}=\ell_{t-1}+\alpha\varepsilon_{t}/s_{t-m}}}\\ {{s_{t}=s_{t-m}+\gamma\varepsilon_{t}/\ell_{t-1}}}\end{array}$
